uno.network.client

Class NetworkClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • uno.network.client.NetworkClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class NetworkClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The network handler for the client side
    Establishes the connection the server and handles the messages received from the server
    Uses a listener for the events that happens
